title: BREAKING NEWS: Ukraine's Kateryna able to perform 🇺🇦
text:
BREAKING NEWS: Ukraine's Kateryna able to perform 🇺🇦
After feeling unwell on Wednesday morning (12 May), the lead singer of Ukraine’s band Go_A, Kateryna Pavlenko, had a PCR test for COVID-19, in accordance with our Health & Safety Protocol. As a precautionary measure, Kateryna did not perform with her band during their second rehearsal.
We are pleased to report that the COVID-19 test has come back negative.
Kateryna is feeling better and looking forward to performing on the Eurovision stage next week.
We are delighted to welcome her back!
